values:
i feel like my life has no meaning anymore. 
i need a job and some hobbies.
i hate feeling unproductive. 
it sucks.
christ, i'm starting to bore myself.
i need assistance in life.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/30992.html

why do i always worry?

i hate thinking that he's doing something bad.

but i think it anyway.

i wish i could just trust people.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/30748.html

i am the best girlfriend. 
ever.
if anyone loves good presents, 
you should be friends with me.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/30556.html

i suck at being alone.





the end.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/30241.html

yes! i am done with school. completely done...except for when i start again in september. but shut up okay. i'm enjoying it for the meantime. i took my final today in math and i actually did good...well for me. and 85%. i've never got above an 80% in math in my entire life. so there. hpmh. i just watched Britney Spears cry about how the tabloids are mean to her. it was actually kind of sad. i feel bad for her. she used to be so hot. anyway, give me a call anytime because I HAVE NO MORE SCHOOL!
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/30184.html

so, believe it or not, i got an interview at Desert Sun (local tanning salon). i said i'd never work at a tanning salon, because usually the only people who work there are bitchy high school girls. and everyone knows how much i love those types. i hope it went well, but i guess we'll see. i am in need of a job asap. it's pretty sweet that my dad gives me $100 and says "make that last 30 days". awesome dad, way to go with the 3 bucks a day. that'll happen. i'm done with relying on them, i feel like a freeloader. i've been trying so incredibly hard to get a job in the harbor, but this town is so bitchy and full of old people, it's become nearly impossible. all the high school kids that are going off to college in the fall need to get the fuck out already so i can get myself a damn job.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/29887.html

so i saw the new AFI video today. 
i'm not exactly sure what to think of what happened to them.
i cant bring myself to dislike them, but AFI seems to be getting pussier and pussier as they put out each CD.
i mean, what ever happened to the Black Sails days?
or even the Art of Drowning? 
those were the best times, i wish they would go back.
and Davey has become one of those people who you would definately have sex with, but wouldnt want to be next to you in the morning when you woke up.
i mean, he wears more makeup than me now.
which is frightening to me.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/29499.html

HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO YOU
HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO YOU
HAPPY BIRTHDAY DEAR MONA
HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO YOU!!!!!!!!!!!
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/29267.html

ricky is home and now i feel complete again. i hate sleeping on my couch because i cant sleep in my bed alone. plus, i didnt want tina pooping on the bed in the middle of the night...AGAIN. disgusting. tina is almost better so she can finally come with me to my sister's and i can leave the house. i've been so bored lately, i need to think of a way to amuse myself. i have no hobbies, other than being bored.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/28968.html
i hate being disappointed. i'd rather be punched in the face than feel let down.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/28711.html

ricky has left me. he's gone to vegas until tuesday. it doesnt seem like a lot of time to most, but i've seen him everyday for the last year (excluding the incident with the DUI and his padre freaking out), and it's been rough for me. at least i trust him. i know he wont put anyone above us and our relationship. i truly suck at being alone. fuck, i even wrote a myspace bulliten about being lonely. i hate people that do that. what have i become? i swore to never live off of myspace and the fakeness of it all. i'm stuck at my house which is great. Tina is still sick, she cant be around other dogs for another week. ughh, this is so annoying. at least i could hang out with my sister or something. but no, of course not.
i might be going with my mom to look at prom dresses tomorrow. i found a bunch of cheap,cute dresses at macy's. props. i'm now bored of this.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/28467.html

so on my birthday, i got a puppy. her name is Tina, she's a rat terrier and she's the cutest thing i've ever seen. yesterday she woke me up coughing at 5:30 in the morning. i was a little worried, so i took her to the vet and it turns out she has kennel cough. she has all her current vaccinations and everything, but since she was the runt, she was more likely to get sick and stuff. she's taking meds (that were extremely expensive by the way. and on top of that she cant hang out with her brother (my sister's puppy) for another 10 days and she's very down in the dumps. 
i feel so terrible. i feel like it's my fault. i should have made sure she wasnt around sick puppies. i feel like i've failed her. i really do love her, she's my responsibility and i fucked up.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/28239.html

i never write in this thing anymore, jesus! anywho, i've been up to a whole lot of nothing to say the least. work has been going good, i've been working for Amanda's mom which has been great because i feel i dont need to put on my fake, professional face and i dont have to worry about her watching everything i do to make sure i'm doing my job. i can take smoke breaks whenever and eat her food if i'm hungry. i wish i could work for her all the time.
i'm getting a puppy after my birthday from one of my sister's friend. she's a toy manchester terrier and her name Lilly. she's the runt, so obviously, she's the cutest. i'm super excited. i have to pay 350 bucks for her but 100 of that is going to be paid by my parents for my birthday present. i cant wait.
life in general has been pretty good but i'm having a little trouble dealing with the whole "girlfriend of a guy in a band" thing. its not that he's in a band, its the fact that they are most likely going on tour this summer and i truly suck at being alone. especially if i know he's away having a great time. i dont know if i'm making the right decision about staying with him while he goes on tour or not. i dont want to get my heart broken if something bad were to happen to our relationship. i.e. other girls. i trust him completely, but when you hear that his friends dont even want us to be together, it makes it harder to be okay with it. so... i'm going to give it a shot and see how it goes. i wouldnt want to give up on our relationship so quickly. he hasnt even done anything wrong. i know there isnt anyone better for me than ricky. we do have our issues, but i wouldnt want it any other way. if we got along all the time and never argued or even screamed at each other, it wouldnt be right. we fight because we love each other. if i didnt care about what he did, we wouldnt ever fight. 
we're planning on moving out and getting our own apartment hopefully by the end of the summer or early next year. i need to get a steady paying job before any of that goes down. house cleaning is going good right now but it's a job i cant rely on. zac might be hooking me and ricky up with a paper route job. the hours are from 1:00-3:30 or so every day, and we'd be making 900 bucks a month. not too bad. the only thing is that i need to take a trip for about a week or so down to oregon to visit my grandparents, i do it every summer. this will probably be the last summer i get to spend with both of them so i cant have a job that wont allow that to happen. we'll see. i need to stop myself before i start talking about a million other things.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/28135.html

i'm done with livejournal fighting, its retarded. i dont give a shit anymore, i just wish people would fucking get along. thats all i want to do. we all just need to chill out and shut the hell up. this is so fucking middle school.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/27889.html

i dont even want to fucking explain myself, but seriously... i havent been this pissed off in god knows how long. all i have to say is grow the fuck up and start acting your age. just because you're miserable doesnt give you the god damn right to make the rest of us feel like shit. it must be pretty fucking lonely in that world of yours where people just do what you say all the time so they wont have to deal with your middle school bullshit. now that i think about it, this whole situation is more pathetic than anything else. its gonna be a huge mother fucking wake up call when you get out into the real world and realize that shit like this doesnt fly. 
and to the only person there today who wasnt an idiot, i fucking love you. you have proven to be a true friend. i couldnt be gladder to call you my best friend, amanda.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/27489.html

so i dont have the internet and i'm still not sure why. that is the reason for my dissapparing off the face of the internet-world. i guess it's not so bad, i can get on only once every 2 weeks or so, but it feels much more rewarding.
school started and i'm flying through it. i'm actually doing really well. aside from the fact that my shakespeare teacher has no clue what the hell she is talking about.
she's one of those shakespeare people who think they know everything about his work and people that dont know EVERYTHING dont deserve to speak about it. yah that's her. even though she's a lame ass.
soooooooooooo life is real good right now.
i bought tans for myself this x mas and i'm so tan!
its like i went to mexico and back in 3 days!
....its hot.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/27374.html

school starts tomorrow and i'm definately not looking forward to it.
however, my new years partay was an ultimate success. i got drunk before everyone and i was one of the last one's standing. trooper. i loved everyone for that night and was an interesting host to say the least. monica knows, she knows the best. 
how come people cant make up their minds about anything? seriously, just figure out what you want and take it. its really not that hard. to quote a friend "people need to stop thinking about what everyone else wants and figure out what THEY want. fucking pussies."
too true. drama, drama, drama. i wish ricky would get back from band practice so we could watch a movie.
The Biggest Loser marathon is on and i'm more enthralled that i thought i'd be. its almost inspiring me to start working out and lose some chub.
pay attention, i said ALMOST.
anywho, i'm boring myself and need some nicotine.
monica, i hope you feel better because i know how it is to be miserably sick when you've got shit to do. call me if you need ANYTHING.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/27118.html

so... i'm starting classes again on tuesday. i was really excited to start, but now that the days are winding down, i'm starting to be less excited about it all. i have one class at the gig harbor campus and one at the tacoma campus. i didnt get into the english class i originally wanted, but now i'm in an even better one. here's what my schedule looks like:
gig harbor campus
psych 100 9:30-10:20a   m t w th 

tacoma campus
into to shakespeare 1:30-2:20p   m t w th

so if anyone has class at either campus any of those times, let me know. i'm going to need to some help getting to my classes for the first few days. my car's title is in the mail back to us any day now. its just a matter of when.
fresh start was possibly the smartest thing i've done academically in my whole life. i'm saving myself so much money. haha, and you're not.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/26862.html

so, i'm sick and x mas is tomorrow.
i got the flu a couple of days ago and it sucks pretty bad...
considering i'm a smoker.
everything is ten times worse when you're sick.
i went to the doctor and she gave me some cough medicine and told me to rest.
so i did.
what she didnt tell me was that this virus attacks the leg muscles so if you lay in bed too long, you wont be able to walk for 3 days.
thanks doc.
i was hobbling around this morning like a 82 year old war veteran.
i'm bored and there's nothing to do. 
i've discovered that x mas doesnt get me as excited as it used to.
if i were 7 i would be bouncing around asking my parents if i could open a present and then forcing myself to go to sleep so tomorrow will come sooner.
i just feel a little bit hungry. that's all.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/26375.html

the tank has finally been taken out.
why does every car that we own break down when i'm driving it?
my car is a trooper. 
almost a year and a half and NO problems what so ever.
i drive my mom's skank tank for 3 weeks and now its busted.
jesus is being great to me this year.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/26362.html

i'm never driving a car again. today=too much driving.

i've done enough for one lifetime.

its over.

i'm not doing it.

hmmpph.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/25997.html

i feel like my life is slowly but surely getting back on track...

i wish the bastard that sold us my car without legally owning it would stop by for a little chat...

and then a little hospital trip...
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/25619.html

my house is where i live.

not a place to party all the time.

i wish people would understand this.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/25361.html

zac got a sidekick.

i want one.

merry christmas to me???
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/25222.html

woah. so the show last night was pretty good. more so than usual. of course mona and i working as a team behind the merch table was a party in itself. made about $100 for the guys. we are permanent merch girls now. i feel more like a groupie every day.
i always enjoy seeing 3 inches of blood, but the sound guy kinda fucked shit up last night. i wasnt aware that feedback could be continously present throughout the whole set. his voice was a sound only dogs could hear. other than that, it was awesome.
i'm proud of the boys for pulling off the maiden cover so gracefully. props guys, props. but when you guys go on tour, you'd better not forget about me or there will be hell to pay.
why is poke'mon stadium so interesting to me? i hate it.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/24937.html

so i'm sad to say, but i had to quit DQ. not that i have anything against Dairy Queen in general, but the one in gig harbor is run by monkeys. 
the chaos in there every night is the same as when that Jahovah guy shot up the tacoma mall.
its very similar.
on the other hand, yes i do smoke pot, so having a job where i have to know how to make 5454254254.55 different kids of blizzards, is just not for me.
Plus, i'm moving to tacoma shorty as it is, i might as well start working there ASAP. 
i need some coffee.
i left the creamer at my sister's house. damn.
everyone in the world should go to hell's kitchen at 7 pm on sunday, not for left alive, but because me and monica will be selling merch and looking extremely sexy.
that is all.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/24772.html

oh god. so party of the century last night kinda. monica, mallory, ricky and i celebrated my new job at DQ in a very interesting way last night: we took shots with my dad. yeah so that was fun in a basket. i wish monica had gotten wasted hence making everything she has to say EXTREMELY important. haha. oh the times. 
anyway, i finished my weekend training at DQ this morning. thank god. i dont remember the last time i was up at 7:30...unless i was drunk and still up from the night before. my first day is tomorrow. i have 5 managers. yes 5. thats about 4 too many bosses if you ask me. she is working me every single day except for thanksgiving. gee thanks for the holiday cheer, lady. 
so if you are in the harbor, stop by DQ and shout me a holla. 
no i cant give you free food because my work is run by nazis. no really, we have cameras. at dairy queen for christ sake. watch out, dont let her put 3 scoops of nuts instead of 2. oooh ahahhahAA
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/24408.html

ricky. because he left a whole gallon of milk on the counter all day. 

i went to DQ and i start training this weekend. i'm not too excited about it because i can already tell that my manager is a bitch. awesome. i'll just have to shove my face with blizzards and pretend that i understand what she's saying.

life is stressing me out. school, work, play, money. it seems they all cant be done. i might not get into fucking fresh start again, because the lady and the GH campus had no idea which way was up. super cool guys.

monica, i miss you. grandy's is being overrun starting the 1st of next month. i say we drop in as much as possible until then. ricky and i made a small trip of our own this week, but it didnt feel complete. when you are done being a chipmunk we must go!

why is it that every time i want to shower, my parents are either doing laundry or the dishes?
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/24219.html

i got a job at DQ on Tuesday. finally bitches. okay, DQ might not be the best place ever, but at least i dont have to cook fries and gross ass hamburgers, i just make the ice cream. 
there are so many different kinds of blizzards and treats to get. my boss is making me memorize their ingredients before i start working. so what did i do? i made flash cards.
every problem in life can be solved with flash cards.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/23811.html

i always knew i was meant to be a pirate. pirates are the shit
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/23734.html

we have esp. 
its a fact.
as soon as i finished my last entry she called.
i just started crying. 
i couldnt say anything.
she asked me if everything was okay.
she has no idea.
i already know i dont like her future husband.
the only reason people try to control their lovers is because they are insecure.
by making others feel insecure, makes them feel more confident.
this is how it starts.
they control who you hang out with.
then what you wear.
then how you think.
then comes the violence.
she'd tell me if he hit her.
i'm going to make that mother fucker sweat.
the minute he touches her in anger,
i'll have his fucking balls on a stake.
you make think i'm just talking shit.
what could a girl of my height do to a grown man?
i tell you what.
make him wish he never was born.
you can beat on me.
but the minute you touch my family,
you'd better start running.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/23400.html

i miss my best friend. my sister. she moved away when we were younger, but i see her every month or so. she's dating this new guy now. this controlling guy. i have no way of contacting her. last time i talked to her was on her birthday in september. she engaged. i'm supposed to be her maid of honor. i want to be there for her, but i cant even talk to her. i called her parents to see if they could help me, they never returned my call. i emailed her so called "friends", to see if they could help me, no answer so far. 
i dont know what to do now. i miss her with all my heart, but there's nothing more for me to do.
its the worst feeing in the world to want to talk to someone so bad and know they want to talk to you too, but you cant.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/23203.html

my costume is taking forever. it will never be completed i tell you. 
i'm pretty bored actually.
it sucks knowing your hair straightener is in another zip code.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/22978.html

i decided to be a can-can dancer. my chance to be a whore without actually being one.

i picked up my mom's weekly Life&Style trash mag and on the front it reads:
"sandra bullock: she wore boots to her wedding!". 

do people really care what she wore on her feet to her own wedding? i'll show them one day. i'll say "fuck you guys, i'm wearing slippers."

not just normal slippers. the kind where you put your foot in homer simpson's mouth.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/22671.html

i dont know what to be for halloween!! any ideas? i want to be something sexy because, well, i never really get to feel sexy. but i dont want anything cliche' like a school girl or witch or anything like that. i need something interesting....
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/22317.html

so i went this morning to pick up ricky at the thurston county juvenille center-thingy, and i walk through ALL the metal detectors and go through all the steps to get into the damn building, but when i finally get to talk to a human, he proceeded to tell me that i was underage therefore he could not release ricky to me.
awesome.
what made things even more awesome was that the man who told me this bit of information, then laughed in my face and shouted to his coworker "hey Jim! this girl is here to pick up her boyfriend and she's only 17!!hahahahahahahahahah" and cracked up for about 5 minutes. 
"i couldnt release him to you even if i wanted to", says rude black man.
i told him i drove all the way out here (to olympia) from gig harbor and since i cant get ricky out, could i at least use a phone to call his dad?
"nope." was all he said to me.
nope. okay you son of a bitch, there's no need to act like you're on the rag.
how can people who work in a jail be so mean to everyone? i could understand being not-so-nice to the immates, but the outsiders? c'mon. 
how was i supposed to know you had to be 18? i've never been to jail, nor have had to go get someone out of jail. do i really look like the kind of person who is familiar to a place like that? 
i can take people talking shit to me and being rude, but when you straight up laugh in my face and then joke about me to someone else, that's when it really gets to me. 
i bet that guy's life is real fun. lets work at a jail! lets laugh at things that arent funny! lets be a big douchebag to young girls who have been nothing but nice! 
i hope he gets mad cow disease.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/22210.html

if you cant see that i'm a good friend to those that are good friends to me, i'm sorry. friendships are 2-sided, ya know? 
i have great friends, i may not have 162 "best friends", but my friends are amazing and all i need. if you dont want to be a part of my life, that's just fine.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/21775.html

so i have a story for you all...
i was sitting outside of starbucks waiting for ricky to get off the bus. some random gig harbor scene kids sit down next to me. why? i dont know and it doesnt matter in this story. i'm reading my book when the extremely annoying girl next to me says to her friends "awww its ricky!". i think to myself 'okay, probably someone ricky knows'. 
later in the evening i ask him who those kids were who aparently knew him. 
ricky shoots me a look of fear and replies 'i have no fucking idea, i was going to ask you the same question'. 

that story was pretty pointless other than the fact that it helps my theory that kids from gig harbor are fucking retarded. i dont talk about people like i'm buds with them unless i am. just because i know their name, doesnt give me the right to use it to sound cool. for instance, i know OF Glenn Danzig. many do. but if i saw him walking down the street, i wouldnt turn to the person next to me and say "aww its danzig." 
i would probably feak out and wet myself and the outcome would most likely involve a restraining order against me, but that's besides the point.

another example would be when kids commit suicide. lots of kids were "so depressed" after josh died, they got into drugs and cut themselves and boo hoo blah blah blah. but the reality of everything is that, most of those kids didnt even know josh at all. i'm not saying by any means that we were best friends, but he was in my life enough to be affected by it. passing someone in the halls everyday at school and hearing that they are dead, is not a reason to go into depression. the real reason is lack of attention or the craving for more. this is a theory i would like to call "Cool By Association". if you know someone who is liked by your peers, faggot kids will pretend to know that person just to sound cooler.

people are idiots and need to stop being sheep and grow a set of balls so they can be their own person.

so yeah...umm...gig harbor sucks.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/21530.html

it's odd how you can grow up so close to one person and then all of a sudden, they change directions on you and become your worst enemy. there is a war within my home and my father and i are at opposite ends.
if i try to talk to him about how he's hurting me, he gets angry and walks away.
if i dont talk to him, he gets angry and ignores me.
i'm sorry if i forget to do the laundry one day, i've been trying to figure out where my life is going.
its sad to see that you still have no idea.
as a daughter, i dont ask much. i dont ask anything at all, because if i did, he'd get angry and walk away.
all i want from him is to KNOW for sure, that he does love me.
but for some reason, that's too much to ask.
if i died tomorrow he wouldnt react, just as long as it didnt cost him any money.
lack of money is a issue in the house right now, but its no reason to neglect your family.
i strive for his pride in me. all i want to do is make him proud, but unless i'm a shakespearean actor, it will never happen.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/21352.html

If you read this,
even if we do not speak often,
comment with one memory of me.
It can be anything you want,
good or bad.
Just as long as it happened.
Then post this on your livejournal.
See what other people remember about you...
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/21234.html

What is greater than God, More evil than the devil, The poor have it,
The rich don't need it, And if you eat it, you'll die?
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/20873.html

so i decided that i LOVE 80's glam rock. i'm not saying they are amazing musicians, they're just hella awesome. 

for sure.


oh yeah and p.s. high school parties suck ass.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/20491.html
9 count 'em, 9 days until i can die happy......
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/20424.html
i think i need to go pray...
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/20183.html

fuck you if you think our friendship meant nothing. it meant everything to me. being flaked on over and over again takes a toll on someone after a while. i made the effort, but the lure of the party scene proved more interesting than me. towards the end, yes, my motivation subsided. a person can only take so much after a while. i'm trying to change my life and i'd hoped you would want to be a part of it. i wont apologize for something i didnt do, but i am sorry you think that people go through life unchanging. i hope you make it in this world in your bubble, i truly do.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/19761.html
i hella missed the OC tonight and i'm pissed about it. god damnit Ricky and you're non-awesomeness.
http://i-am-the-cause.livejournal.com/19571.html

i am officially disenrolled from gig harbor high school, thank jesus. i waited in the couselling office for a good 45 minutes before i could speak with Hyde for not even 5 minutes. fuck high school. fuck the stupid drama. fuck the teachers. fuck the students. fuck the bullshit assignments. fuck the administration...except Vern, he is simply amazing.

i want to be productive today. whenever i wake up before 11:00, i feel i've accomplished something even if i've done nothing.

i decided i need to start working out, things are just getting too out of control. the love handles, the thunder thighs, its getting to a point...

i'm bored just looking at what i've written. if i wasnt me, i'd definately wouldnt read my livejournal.

so, it's my sister's birthday today. yay her. umm i think she's 31, or 30... damn you mary jane and your effect on my short term memory.

i miss monica. we needs some Grands and bad.
